src:
Mančester besplatno vodi navijače u Kazahstan
01 Nov 2019, 20:46 by Darko
Mančester Junajted je ponudio svojim navijačima besplatan put na utakmicu Lige Evrope protiv Astane u Kazahstanu.
U obzir za besplatan „izlet“ na najdalje gostovanje „crvenih đavola“, dolaze samo navijači koji su oštećeni prilikom bankrota turističke kompanije „Tomas Kuk“. Svi navijači koji imaju dokaz da su uplatili neko putovanje preko „Tomasa Kuka“, a zbog kolapsa ove kompanije nisu ga iskoristili, moći će sa Mančester Junajtedom besplatno da putuju u Kazahstan, 28. novembra.
Mančester Junajted je samo jedan od engleskih klubova koji su sarađivali sa kompanijom „Tomas Kuk“. Pored kluba sa Old Traforda, pomenuta kompanija je bila partner i Mančester Sitiju, Livepulu, Čelsiju…

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Manchester takes fans to Kazakhstan for free
01 Nov 2019, 19:46 by Darko
Manchester United have offered their fans a free trip to the Europa League game against Astana in Kazakhstan.
Considering the free “trip” to the furthest away from the Red Devils, only the fans who were damaged by the bankruptcy of the Thomas Cook tourist company are coming. Any fans who have proof that they have paid for a trip through Thomas Cook and have not used it due to the collapse of this company will be able to travel with Kazakhstan United free of charge to Kazakhstan on November 28.
Manchester United is just one of the English clubs that have partnered with Thomas Cook. In addition to the club from Old Traford, the company was also a partner of Manchester City, Livepool, Chelsea…
